Name: Repealing the tax on beer and liquor.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the tax on beer and liquor

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Finance
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Attachments.Name: June 17, 2021 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - June 17, 2021

Summary: This local law would repeal the New York City excise tax on beer, liquor and wine as of July 1, 2021.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Subdivision f of section 11-2056 of chapter 20 of title 11 of the administrative code of the city of New York is added to read as follows:
      (f) Beginning on July first, two thousand twenty-one, there shall be no tax imposed under this subchapter. 
      ï¿½2. This local law takes effect immediately. 






SR
LS #14,078, 17,272
5/12/2021
